1.name: Marc Taló
1.text: An excellent and very professional service. We are very happy with their attention and results.

2.name: Fernando Mas
2.text: Without a doubt, a team of highly professional and attentive lawyers, with a very high level of resolution and willing to help and advise you on any legal question at all times. I have been counting on their help for years and always with a high level of satisfaction.

3.name: Rafael Rabat
3.text: We have been working with the Emindset Law team for some time and I vouch for their quality and professionalism.

4.name: Sergi Martin
4.text: Emindset combines trust and rigor in equal parts. With high professionalism, their team offers precise and effective legal solutions, always with empathetic and approachable treatment that leads to personalized attention. And all this with a fresh approach to work, with a modern and proactive vision of law.

mission.title: Our philosophy
mission.subtitle: Mission and Values
mission.description: Our commitment is to solve your legal challenges with a modern and efficient approach.
mission.statement1: When something important is at stake, you are not at peace. You know a false step can be costly.
mission.statement2: At Emindset Law we understand you. We know how it feels. That's why we arrive with solutions before the problem appears. Because the worst conflict is the one that could have been avoided.
mission.statement3: And a good agreement is worth more than a thousand battles. Because you are not here to lose any.
mission.statement4: We don't put out fires, we prevent them. Preventing, helping, and protecting: that is our real job. We take care of you as if your business were our own. Because this is not about laws. It's about you. And about protecting what has cost you so much to build.

cta_section.title: Need advice?
cta_section.subtitle: Request a no-obligation quote
cta_section.description: Our team will contact you within 24 hours to analyze your case.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: Discover how Emindset Law was born and evolved over the years

story.paragraph1: A law firm that was born in 2016, thanks to a team with a common vision:
story.highlight1: to humanize the legal profession and break with all stereotypes.
story.paragraph2: It could be a useful, approachable, and deeply human tool.
story.paragraph3: A real way to accompany and transform lives.
story.paragraph4: From the beginning, we knew we wanted to do things differently.
story.paragraph5: Not from the coldness of the suit and the office, but from listening and commitment to people.
story.paragraph6: And, to be honest, arriving with a new mindset wasn't easy.
story.paragraph7: Breaking with the established always commands respect.
story.paragraph8: But over time, it was that human and authentic perspective
story.paragraph9: that allowed us to make a difference and become a reference in the legal sector.
story.highlight2: Always faithful to what drives us:
story.paragraph10: helping and being present when we are needed most.
story.quote: "Transforming law into a human and approachable experience since 2016."

timeline.title: Important milestones
timeline.subtitle: OUR JOURNEY
timeline.description: A glimpse of the key moments that have defined our trajectory.

items.2016: Foundation of Emindset Law with a small team of 5 lawyers committed to a different vision of law.
items.2018: Opening of our first office in Barcelona and expansion of the team to 15 professionals.
items.2020: International expansion with the opening of our office in Andorra, specializing in international taxation.
items.2022: Creation of our New Technologies division, focused on startups and technology companies.
items.2024: Opening of our office in Toulouse and recognition as one of the most innovative law firms in Europe.
